message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. However, $20,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $8,000?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this offer still reflects a fair deal considering the benefits you'll gain.
Hi Alice, I understand the value this product offers, but $17,000 is still a bit beyond my price range. Would you be willing to meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps around $10,000?
